title: 325I.03 ENFORCEMENT; CIVIL LIABILITY.
text: The public and private remedies in section 8.31 apply to violations of section 325I.02. In addition, a consumer who prevails or substantially prevails in an action brought under this section is entitled to a minimum of $500 in damages, regardless of the amount of actual damage proved, plus costs, disbursements, and reasonable attorney fees. Sections 325I.01 to 325I.03 do not affect any rights or remedies available under other law.
